name: SoftGhost Online
description:
Welcome to SoftGhost! Show everyone who's the fastest player by clicking and setting a new world record!

Jump into an adventurous clicker journey and take a break from reality. In this fun and challenging game, you must avoid obstacles while running through a maze. Can you set the new world speedrun record

SoftGhost features

● A soft game character

● An online leaderboard

● One level only - see who can complete it the fastest

● Share

Note : controller &  Character create by : Tarodev
